"use client";import{useState}from"react";import{Link,useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import apiService from"../services/api";import"./RegisterPage.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const RegisterPage=()=>{const[email,setEmail]=useState("");const[password,setPassword]=useState("");const[confirmPassword,setConfirmPassword]=useState("");const[isLoading,setIsLoading]=useState(false);const[error,setError]=useState("");const[success,setSuccess]=useState("");const navigate=useNavigate();const handleRegister=async e=>{e.preventDefault();if(password!==confirmPassword){setError("Mật khẩu không khớp!");return;}if(password.length<6){setError("Mật khẩu phải có ít nhất 6 ký tự!");return;}setIsLoading(true);setError("");setSuccess("");try{await apiService.register(email,password);setSuccess("Đăng ký thành công! setTimeout(async()=>{try{await apiService.login(email,password);navigate("/");window.location.reload();}catch(loginError){navigate("/login");}},2000);}catch(error){console.error("Registration error:",error);setError(error.message||"Đăng ký thất bại");}finally{setIsLoading(false);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"register-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{className:"register-box",onSubmit:handleRegister,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"register-title",children:"\u0110\u0102NG K\xDD"}),error&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"error-message",children:error}),success&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"success-message",children:success}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Email"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"email",placeholder:"Nh\u1EADp email",value:email,onChange:e=>setEmail(e.target.value),required:true,disabled:isLoading}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"M\u1EADt kh\u1EA9u"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"password",placeholder:"Nh\u1EADp m\u1EADt kh\u1EA9u (\xEDt nh\u1EA5t 6 k\xFD t\u1EF1)",value:password,onChange:e=>setPassword(e.target.value),required:true,disabled:isLoading,minLength:6}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"X\xE1c nh\u1EADn m\u1EADt kh\u1EA9u"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"password",placeholder:"Nh\u1EADp l\u1EA1i m\u1EADt kh\u1EA9u",value:confirmPassword,onChange:e=>setConfirmPassword(e.target.value),required:true,disabled:isLoading}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",className:"register-button",disabled:isLoading,children:isLoading?"Đang đăng ký...":"Đăng ký"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"register-links",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/login",children:"\u0110\xE3 c\xF3 t\xE0i kho\u1EA3n"})})]})});};export default RegisterPage;
